plot: Alyssa just had it with men dumping her - promising they would "stay friends". Taking an advice of her counsellor Michael too literally, she kills off her ex-lovers one by one.
title: Let's Stay Friends
plot_es: Alyssa just had it with men dumping her - promising they would "stay friends". Taking an advice of her counsellor Michael too literally, she kills off her ex-lovers one by one.
plot_en: Alyssa just had it with men dumping her - promising they would "stay friends". Taking an advice of her counsellor Michael too literally, she kills off her ex-lovers one by one.
